meanings.definition: A type of casual footwear, typically made of canvas or synthetic material, with a rubber sole.
meanings.sent1: I love my new tekkies because they are so comfortable to wear.
meanings.sent2: She bought a pair of tekkies for her daily walks in the park.
meanings.sent3: The tekkies were so colorful that they brightened up his entire outfit.
meanings.sent4: Her tekkies were like little clouds cushioning her feet with every step.
meanings.sent5: The tekkies left colorful footprints on the sandy beach as she walked along the shore.

meanings.definition: To engage in the activity of wearing tekkies.
meanings.sent1: Every morning, he tekkies up before heading out for his jog.
meanings.sent2: She tekkies to work every day because they are so comfortable.
meanings.sent3: He tekkies around the house pretending to be a secret agent on a mission.
meanings.sent4: She tekkies through the park as if she's walking on clouds.
meanings.sent5: The children tekkies around the playground, full of energy and laughter.
